overview: Recorded live at Budokan Hall, Tokyo, on April 22nd 1988.  1		Love Gun  2		Cold Gin  3		Bang Bang You  4		Calling Dr. Love  5		Fits Like A Glove  6		Crazy Crazy Nights  7		Guitar Solo Bruce Kulick  8		No No No  9		Reason To Live  10		Heaven's On Fire  11		Drum Solo Eric Carr  12		War Machine  13		I Love It Loud  14		Lick It Up  15		Black Diamond  16		I Was Made For Lovin' You  17		Shout It Out Loud  18		Strutter  19		Rock And Roll All Nite  20		Detroit Rock City  Bass, Vocals – Gene Simmons  Drums – Eric Carr  Guitar – Bruce Kulick  Vocals, Guitar – Paul Stanley
title: Kiss Live at Budokan 1988
